author: Warner Todd Huston, Warner Todd Huston
title: Astros' Justin Verlander and Wife Kate Upton Donate MLB Paychecks to Coronavirus Relief
description: Houston Astros pitcher Justin Verlander told fans that he would be donating his ongoing Major League Baseball paychecks to coronavirus relief.
content:
On Saturday, Houston Astros pitcher Justin Verlander told fans that he would be donating his ongoing Major League Baseball paychecks to coronavirus relief.
Verlander and his supermodel wife announced their donation in an Instagram message where the player sa… [+1081 chars]
